amendment.description: To provide that surcharges received from the sale of coins under the Act are used to reduce the national debt.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4120 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4120 proposed by Senator Walsh for Senator Johanns.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4120 proposed by Senator Walsh for Senator Johanns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4120 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
